For years Peter had done a great job suppressing his desire for diapers, every time the thought of wearing one came to his mind he would push the thought away. Today Peter is helping Aunt May clean out the garage when he finds an old unopened package of pull-ups.

1132.title: Tony Stark

choices: Peter reluctantly puts on a pull-up before putting the suit on

11322.content:
In his most recent mission, Peter Parker ran into a predicament while fighting Dr. Octopus. What he thought would be an easy victory turned into a disaster as the two were almost evenly matched. The fight dragged on for hours and Peter quickly found himself in a predicament, he needed to use the bathroom. The fight showed no sign of slowing down so Peter had no choice, he wet himself in his Spiderman suit. Unfortunately, the liquid caused his suit to short out and Dr. Octopus got away. Peter tried to fix the suit himself but didn't have any luck, he had to tell Tony Stark the embarrassing news.

Peter had Happy schedule an impromptu meeting with Tony at the Avengers Headquarters. Something Tony wasn't too thrilled about. "Okay kid, what is so important that I needed to drop everything I was doing to have a face to face meeting with you. Because there are thousands of more important and entertaining things I could be doing right now."

"Okay Mr. Stark, I'm sorry but the suit kind of shorted out and I don't know how fix it. I don't know how it shorted out.. It just kind of... well.. happened." Peter said holding the suit in his hand.

Tony took the suit out of Peter's hand and looked it over "Look kid, the suit doesn't just short itself out like that. I would know, I designed it. It's waterproof on the outside so that wouldn't be a problem so there's no way that would be an issue." Tony placed the suit in a scanner and talked to his voice assistant F.R.I.D.A.Y, the replacement to J.A.R.V.I.S, "Analyze, determine the source of the short." The scanner sent rays of beams of light across the suit and showed a digital image of the suit highlighting the crotch area as the source of the short. Tony looked closer at the image and then looked at Peter who was red in the face. Tony paused for a moment "Congratulation, you shorted out your suit by pissing yourself."

Peter's face was still red, "pfffft, I did not." he said in a very unconvincing tone.

"Well, the suit says otherwise." Tony replied.

There was a short pause. "Well, can you fix it?" Peter asked.

"Of course I can fix it but I don't want to have to keep fixing it." Tony said as he began to call Happy, "Hey Happy, run to the store and pick up some diapers or pull-ups you think will fit the kid. Don't ask questions, he'll explain it to you later. Just make sure he wears them on his next mission."

"Mr. Stark, don't you think this is kind of unreasonable. I mean the only reason I had an accident was because the battle lasted like 4 hours. It was like a one time thing." Peter pleaded.

"I don't care kid, I've had long ass battles too and you don't see me pissing my pants."

"Your suit literally has a built in bathroom in it, couldn't you add that to mine too?" Peter asked.

Tony laughed ,"I mean I could but that's too much work. You're still small enough, you can pull off wearing diapers."

"Mr Stark, I'm fifteen..."

"Exactly kid you just proved my point. You're still young enough." Tony said at that moment Happy came walking in with several packs of diapers and pull-ups. "That was quick," Tony said

"Yes sir, love the new teleporters you designed." Happy said. "I didn't know what to get for the kid so I got several kinds. Pull-ups, goodnites, and pampers."

"I'm not wearing a diaper!" Peter pleaded.

Tony looked at Peter, "Look kid if you want to be a part of the Avengers and continue to be Spiderman you don't really have a choice. I don't have the time to redesign your suit right now. I'm busy with other projects. Now I'm going to place your suit in the scanner and it will be good as new in a couple minutes. You need to wear some sort of protection while wearing it though because one more accident and it could be completely irreparable. You're lucky it was just a small short."

The two remain silent for a while as the suit finishes being repaired by the scanner. Peter is not happy about the idea of wearing a diaper under his suit. With the skin tight design people are sure to make out the outline of a diaper. As the scanner finishes, Tony and Happy leave the room so Peter can change.
11322.title: As punishment for damaging the spider suit

choices: The suits emergency mode already alerted Tony
Peter is confronted by thugs and is humilated further
More choices
113222.content:
Peter wasn't about to subject himself to ridicule. He waited for Tony to leave. He put the suit on and decided to go on patrol.

Peter was swinging around the city as he thought to himself, "If I capture Dr. Octopus Tony will be so impressed with me he'll make me a full Avenger."

Peter took out his frustration at being called a kid by Tony on a purse snatcher. The common criminals were easily dsipatched. But a silent alarm at Oscorp was tripped.

Using the police scanner he took from Stark Labs Peter smiled this was definately the Doctor.

Peter headed over to Oscorp and sure enough he saw Doc Oct. Peter checked first on the knocked out cops and got them to saftey before webbing Doc Octs glasses.

"Spiderman back again i see. Well im afriad i have no time to play!" Doc Oct says.

Peter laughs. "I was gonna say the same thing I went easy on you last time."

Peter charges at Doc Oct and lands several good hits. And feels confident ij his victory. Tony was gonna be so impressed. But Peter's spider sense goes crazy and before he can react Doc Oct blows up.

Peter groans the suit absorbed most of the impact but before he can react the real Doc Oct slams his armored tentacles into Peter's chest multiple times.

Peter goes to use his web shooter but screams in agony as Doc Oct smashes both his wrists. Shartering the web shooters.

'You interfered in my plans for the last time bug!" Doc Oct says as he breaks Peter's right arm causing Peter to howl in pain.

"Before I kill you bug lets see who you are." Doc Oct removes Peter's mask. Peter's face was streaked with tears.

Peter's eyes widen in horror as he feels a tentacle wrap around his neck. He didnt want to die. In fear he pisses his pants again shortening out the suit again.

"Ah just a boy! Get in my way again and i wont be as nice!" Doc Oct says as he leaves.

Peter sobs happy he was killed but still terrifed. He gets his mask back on but with his arm and web shooters broken he cant swing out. Peter limps off and tries to find a way to contact Tony.
113222.title: Peter doesn't wear protection while wearing...

choices: Peter lies and says he doesn't know what caused the short
Peter looks at the ground and admits he had an accident
Something else
1132221.content:
With his limp hindering his ability to walk and the pain from his broken arm, Peter only makes it as far as the next block. He sits down on a bench to rest for a moment while he replays the days events in his mind. He wonders how he'll ever be able explain it all to Mr. Stark. He ruined his suit again by having another accident on the same day Mr. Stark had told him he needed to wear protection. 'Mr. Stark's crazy if he thinks I'll ever wear a diaper, those are for babies. I'll just have him add a bathroom or something when he builds me a new suit. Oh my god what am going to do!' Peter thinks to himself, disgusted by the thought of wearing a diaper again. He buries his head in his hands and starts to cry, his arm still hurt from being broken but he didn't care.

After crying for a few minutes, Peter soon hears what sounds like a small jet approaching. He looks up and sees a familiar figure, Tony Stark showing up wearing his Iron Man suit. Tony lands and removes his mask before approaching Peter who was still clad in his Spiderman suit. "What's wrong kid? You look terrible." Tony asked.

Peter looked up at Tony and then back at the ground and sighed before removing his mask, "I was rescuing some lady's purse from a thief when Doc Oct appeared out of nowhere. I wasn't prepared and he pinned me down and removed my mask. The only reason he didn't kill me is because I look young.... How did you find me?"

"Your suit sent out a distress signal but it disappeared for some reason, we debated about sending out the whole Avengers team but I decided to come check out the situation first. Good thing too, could you imagine how angry Banner would be if he had to stop what he was doing to take care of your sorry ass?" Tony replied causing Peter to crack a smile. "So are you injured kid? You're suit isn't communicating with me for some reason."

Peter grew red in the face, "I.. I think I broke my arm and might of sprained my leg. I just can't believe I lost to him again"

"Yeah, weird kid. Your suit should have protected you if it was working correctly. Let's get you back to Avenger's HQ and see if that fancy Wakanda shit can't fix you up. Hop on." Tony said offering a hand to Peter who gladly to the offer. Tony's suit grabbed onto Peter and the two flew back to Avengers HQ. When the two arrived at Avengers HQ, Peter was quickly rushed to the infirmary where medicine from Wakanda was stored. Tony removed the Spiderman suit from Peter's body and took it down to his lab. He told the nurse to have Peter find him when he was completely healed.

Within an hour the Wakandan medicine does the trick and Peter is as good as new. His broken arm which would normally take weeks to heal was completely healed and his limp was gone. Any other internal injuries he had suffered were fixed as well. The nurse released Peter from the infirmary and sent him down to Tony's lab where he saw Tony carefully studying his Spiderman suit. "He..Hey Mr. Stark. The nurse told me you wanted to see me?" he said.

"Hey Peter, Yeah, I wanted to talk to you about your suit." Tony replied and Peter's face flushed red. "It shorted out again, but I can't identify the cause this time. It was either due to a faulty repair the first time or another accident on your part. It's fixable so I don't need to design you a new suit but I do need to know the cause of the short." Tony said looking up at Peter.

113222111.content:
Peter feels defeated and slouches against the door. He buries hies head in his crossed arms and begins to cry. 'What's wrong with me? I've now had two accidents in my suit and I'll never get to be an Avenger.'

Meanwhile in the lab, it was pretty obvious to Tony what had happened. Every test he ran on the suit proved that it had shorted out due to internal water damage. "uh huh, just as I expected. The kid didn't listen to me and now he pissed in another suit. You know, this is why I hate teenagers, they don't listen to you" he said to his virtual assistant. Tony got up and open door to the lab which Peter was slouched against. The sudden opening of the door caused Peter to fall down at Tony's feet and he looked up to see his idol with a disapproving face, he was in trouble and he knew it. "Get up kid, I got your suit fixed." Tony said.

Peter's face lit up and he ran over and grabbed the suit, "Really! you were able to fix it!"

Tony quickly snatched the suit out of Peter's hands, "Not so fast kid. Clearly you're not ready for this. You've managed to short it out not once, but TWICE, in one day by pissing yourself. Why the hell should I give it back to you?"

Peter was stunned, "Because... Because I'm Spiderman. I'm part of the Avengers" he replied.

Tony laughed, "Do you see any of the other Avengers ruining their suits by pissing themselves?"

Peter paused for a moment, "What about Groot? He's a baby."

"First of all, Groot is not an Avenger, he's one of our allies... Secondly, He is a TREE," Tony replied in a displeased tone.

"But he's a baby!" Peter protested.

"And he's a tree!" Tony said getting annoyed with the conversation, "Look kid, you're missing my point. You can't be an Avenger if you keep ruining your suit mid battle by pissing yourself. Either wear something to protect your suit or you're off the Avengers. End of story."

"But Mr. Stark... Only babies wear diapers," Peter pleaded. "Please can't you just add a bathroom to my suit or something?"

Tony laughed, "I don't know how to do that. I mean, I do know how to do it... I just don't want to. You've already wasted enough of my time kid. I'll give you the suit back if you agree to wear protection otherwise I'll let Nick Fury know that you're not ready to be an Avenger."

113222111133113.content:
Peter had just about to head out the front door of his house when he saw Aunt May emerge from the kitchen. "Where do you think youre going Peter?! You just got home?" She said.

"I...I...Im just going out on patrol. Need to save the world and stuff," he replied

"Well, its a school night so youre not going anywhere until your homework is done. Plus im making dinner."

"Ill stay for dinner but aunt May, my homework isnt due until next week. I can do it later and be fine." Peter pleaded but aunt may just gave him a stern look making him cave. "Alright fine, ill get a start on it but i wont have it finished till next week."

Aunt May smiled and began setting the table for dinner, "just because your an avenger doesnt mean you can ignore your school responsibilities. You wouldn't want to be the only avenger who never graduated high school."

Peter rolled his eyes as he sat down at the table, "Thor never graduated from high school," he said trying to prove aunt may wrong.

Aunt may set a bowl of spaghetti on the table as she replied, "yes, but thor is a god from another planet. He doesnt count."

Peter having already cramming food in his mouth replied, "True, but he is still an avenger and he doesnt have a degree so your point is invalid."

Aunt may looked at Peter. "Youre getting your diploma, theres no arguing it." She said half annoyed. There was a long pause before she decided to change the subject. "So i noticed Tony Stark sent you a package, what was in it."

Peter nearly choked on his spaghetti at the mention of the package. He didnt know aunt may had seen the package. He panics for a second before nervously replying, "oh, ummm its nothing... just some new tech for my suit."

Aunt May looks at peter suspicously, "youre acting weird today peter. Is something bothering you?"

1132221111331132212.content:
"Aunt May, I don't need to see a doctor, this is a one time thing!" Peter pleaded. "I haven't wet the bed since I was six. I'll do my own laundry and get everything cleaned up. Just please don't make me go to the doctor."

Aunt May sighed, "Alright, no doctor but you need to watch how much you drink before bed and actually go to bed at a decent time, no staying up and playing video games or fighting crime on a school night. If it happens again I'll call the doctor and we'll have to consider our options. Now get yourself changed and I'll drive you to school, just leave your sheets in front of the washer and I'll take care of it."

"Thanks Aunt May, it won't happen again." Peter says as she walked out. He quickly stripped his clothes off and took a speedy shower. 'How could I have wet the bed? that never happens,' he thought. 'Must be all the stress from fighting Dr. Oct... either that or Tony did something to make me use the pull-ups. Tony wouldn't do that would he? Could he?' Peter contemplated the idea as he finished getting ready for school.

Once Peter is ready he heads down stairs where Aunt May is waiting with car keys in one hand and Peter's backpack in the other. He grabs his backpack and opens it as they head to the car to make sure his Spiderman suit is inside, he wouldn't want to forget that. Aunt May starts the car and the two speed away.

Peter is halfway to school when...

Peter didnt pay attentionand much to his dismay Aunt May pulled up to the front of the school rather than a block away sp no one would see his Aunt dropping him off.

113222111133113221222.content:
By the time Peter makes it to school he had already missed 3 classes and the only thing standing between him and lunch was one class, math. Peter was actually really good at math but absolutely hated the class as he found it boring. He already knew how to do everything. To pass the time, he would sketch new designs for his Spiderman suit and think about different ways to take on villains. By the time the bell rang, peter had drawn a very elaborate new suit with some cool new tech he hoped to convince Tony to add.

Peter went to lunch where the cafeteria was serving mediocre luke pizza, questionable fruit, and of course a pint of milk. Peter grimaced looking at his tray, cafeteria food was not his first choice. Usually Aunt May made a sack lunch for him but given their morning rush he forgot to grab it. Peter took his tray and sat next to Ned and MJ and the three talked about the latest school rumors.

As lunch ended, Peter suddenly realized he needed to pee. He hadn't gone since he'd wet the bed that morning. He quickly ran to the bathroom and went straight to the first urinal he saw and sighed a breath of relief. "God, that was close. I don't know what I'll do if I have that happen to me while I'm on patrol tonight, Tony will kill me if I ruin another suit," Peter thought to himself.

During his last three cases Peter couldn't stop thinking about his situation. He doesn't want to accidentally ruin another suit, but wearing pull-ups is an absolutely revolting idea. Peter could just wing it and hope he doesn't have a sudden urge to go, or he could sneak home and take a pull-up from the box Tony gave him and hope that Aunt May doesn't see him.

113222111133113221222222.content:
In Peter's hurry, he had completely forgotten to sneak back home through the window. He swung open the front door, threw his mask on the floor, and immediately ran upstairs. His abrupt entrance and sense of urgency startled Aunt May who had been sitting at the kitchen table working from her laptop.

Upon seeing Peter race upstairs, Aunt May picked up his mask and followed him to ensure everything was alright. She knocked on Peter's door but immediately entered before Peter could say anything. "Hey Peter is everything okay?"

Peter had his back to door but upon hearing Aunt May's voice he turned around giving her a clear view of the wet spot on the front of his suit. She looked at Peter with a look of concern. "Ummm, I'm okay Aunt May. Just had a rough night on patrol. I ran into Shocker and we had a bit of fight and I got shocked... and now umm, I need Mr. Stark to fix my suit. It wasn't my fault though, Shocker's shock made me lose control... I did beat him though."

Aunt May sighed, "I don't know Peter. First you wet the bed this morning, now this. I'm just a little concerned."

"Nope, everything's fine Aunt May. Nothing to worry about."

"Uh huh," she says, not believing Peter.

"Alright night Aunt May I love you." Peter says.

11322211113311322122222231.content:
Peter stays up all night tinkering with the suit. He runs countless tests and spends hours repairing various components. Pretty soon he has the suits main computer running and is able to run a complete diagnostic. All systems appeared normal.

Once Peter was satisfied and confident the suit would work, he turned his light off and went to bed. He checked the time on phone, 4:15am and he had to be up at 7am for classes. "Guess ill just have to fake being sick'," Peter thinks to himself as he falls asleep.
11322211113311322122222231.title: Peter tries to fix the suit on his own so Tony ...

choices: Peter runs into Tony on patrol
Aunt may punishes peter for faking being sick
113222111133113221222222312.content:
Peter pretended to be sick. He kept his forhead close to his nightlight for a while to fake a fever.

Aunt may sighs and tells Peter tocrest and she'll fix him some soup.

Peter gets his suit on and heads out on Patrol.
113222111133113221222222312.title: Peter fakes being sick and goes out on patrol

choices: Peter returns and Aunt May is mad that he faked being sick and skipped school
Peter changes to regular clothes and goes to Ned's
Something else
1132221111331132212222223121.content:
Peter begins his patrol of the city having made the decison to skip class. He wasn't even missing anything important anyways, he's never gonna use the pythagorean theorem or chemistry anyways, especially because he already has a career as an Avenger... well trainee, he thought to himself.

Peter patroled the city for hours but had no luck other than stopping a shoplifter. Doc Oct was nowhere to be seen and the city was relatively calm. A few minutes later he sees a familiar figure in the sky and recognizes it as Tony in his Ironman suit coming in for a landing.

'Oh, now what does he want,' he mumbles to himself.

"I heard that," Tony said as he landed, "it's my technology you know, I can listen in and mess with you whenever I want."

"That's not creepy at all," Peter replied.

"Well, given how childish you've acted recently I figure its warranted. I mean, I could always take the suit back and you could run around in sweatpants again."

"No Mr. Stark, thats fine I love the suit." Peter replied.

Tony took a sip of water as he looked at Peter's suit. "Yeah, i wanted to talk to you about the suit." Peter's face looked at Tony with a panicked look. "I think I found a way to add a bathroom compartment into it without compromising suits functionality and shape, then you wont need to continue to wear those pull-ups you refuse to wear."

Peter got excited, "Really!?"

"Yeah, problem is that after yesterday I stopped getting data readouts from the suit and when I tried to push a software update it failed.... you wouldn't happen to know anything about that would you kid."

Peter turned flush white as he knew what caused the problem. "I uhhhhh, may have had another accident.... and.. tried to repair the suit myself."

Tony was mad. "You had another accident in the suit!? Let me guess, you didn't wear the pull-ups because they're babyish or something!?"

Peter nodded his head and Tony sighed, "Your accidents keep costing Stark industries time and money, the new technology for your suit will be $7,000,000 as I don't have an extra chip lying around to fix your suit again."

Peter looked down, "I'm sorry Mr. Stark. I didnt mean to."

"Well kid, it's gonna be 3 weeks until i can properly fix your suit and add a bathroom. The suit should be fine although some functions may not work until then. Either wear the pull-ups in the meantime or you can forget about being Spiderman until i get the suit fixed."

"Yes Mr. Stark, ill wear the pull-ups," Peter says hesitantly.

"Good," Tony says as he flies away.
1132221111331132212222223121.title: Peter runs into Tony on patrol

11322211113311322122222231211.content:
Peter heads home and instead of a warm greeting from his Aunt she says in stern tone "We need to talk. What is this calling in sick business Peter. You know lying isnt okay. What would your Uncle say hmm."

Peter hated when she did that he hated feeling as if he let his Uncle down yet again. Peter tears up and runs up to his room. Peter falls into his bed and sobs into his pillow.

Peter hears the phone ring and his Aunt answers talking to Martha Peter knows she is gonna tell Martha how he was lying. Martha always made him seem like a trouble maker.
11322211113311322122222231211.title: Peter returns and Aunt May is mad that he faked...

choices: Doc Oct appears once again
Peter makes an interesting discovery
Paeter calls it quits and goes home
113222111133113221222222312113.content:
Peter gets out of bed and decides to go on patrol one more time for the day hoping hes able to do something more useful. He grabs his suit and opens his closet staring at the box Tony had left.

"Stupid Tony, he's the one forcing me wear these things," he says as he pulls a diaper out of the box and puts it on. "Stupid things makes me look like I'm five."

Peter puts his suit on over top and checks himself out. Surprisingly, the diaper was almost entirely unnoticeable despite the suits skin tight design. Peter leaves the house and begins his patrol beginning with stopping a gas station robbery before stopping a purse snatcher. "God there's nothing exciting tonight peter thinks."

Peter doesnt mess or wet but cries
Peter tries to stop doc oct and is so badly hurt he becomes incontinent
1132221111331132212222223121131.content:
Peter was about to head home but his spidey sense went crazy. Before Peter could react a large mechanical arm smashes into his chest.

Peter is sent flying and hits a wall with a thud. Peter manages to recover and engages Doc Oct in combat.

Doc Oct is relentlesss. Peter was overwhelmed and soon he was screaming in pain as Doc Octs arms smash into him.

"Ill leave you alive for now but cross me again little spider and Ill crush you like a bug leaving nothing left of you." Doc Oct leaves.

114.content: After being sent on a long and exhausting mission by Nick Fury, Peter realizes that one downside to his suit is a lack of a bathroom. He thought he had a bladder of steel but he's no Iron Man and had an accident in his suit halfway through the mission. In an effort to prevent future accidents Peter decides to wear diapers on his next mission.

115111.content: While MJ used to act like she didn’t care about anything, she always cared about her husband, Peter. Due to this, she was very supportive when he told her about his little space. While one of the bedrooms room in the house was a regular room you might expect a married couple to have, another bedroom was an adult sized nursery for Peter.

11512.content: So Ned knows that Peter Parker uses Little Space to relax from his school and superhero work. What type of relationship do the pair have? Is Ned Peter's caregiver (Daddy does not have to be sexual) or does he just give excuses and helps out when Peter slips?

1151222.content: Peter had a secret he would use Little space to de-stress from his life. For the longest time he had been without a caregiver, his best friend Ned doing the best he could but it was not back until everyone came back from the snap that Peter had found a caregiver. One day when New was sick Peter had fallen into Little Space at school and had rushed to the bathroom as he cried. As he cried someone knocked on the door asking, "Is everything alright in there?" Peter let out a soft squeak as he curled up in the stall only for the door to crash open revealing....
1151222.title: Slipping at school without Ned

choices: Pete hugged him
Pete sniffed and cried for his Daddy
11512221.content:
As Peter had slipped further in his head space than normal the bathroom stall burst open to reveal Brad Davis. If he had been in his right mind Peter would have thought back to right before his trip to space he had babysat the former kid now said kid was in the same grade he was. "Peter?" Brad said his voice full of concern as saw Peter curled into a ball. Brad knew that some people who had returned from the Blip had some trouble being back but he had never seen anyone act like this. Acting on instinct Brad knelt down so he was eye lever with the other boy. "You okay Pete?" he tried again making Peter look up at him as that was what Ned would call him when he slipped and made him feel calm.

"Scawd," was all Peter said and before Brad could do anything....

info.brief_description: Peter Parker isn't just hiding the fact that he's Spiderman, he's also a diaper boy.
info.description:
Peter Parker ends up in diapers. Not only does he need to hide his adventures as Spiderman but, he also need to hide his diapers. Pick your favorite Spiderman and why he's diapered and enjoy.

Chapters should be at least two sentences although longer is preferred.

All characters belong to their respective owners this is just for entertainment purposes so enjoy.
